snippet.title: HERE COMES AUSTRALIAN RETAIL SALES...
snippet.content:
Australia's retail sales report for June is about to be released.
Economists expect sales to grow by 0.2%, well below the pace seen in the prior two months.
Retail sales volumes - something that will feed directly into household consumption in Australian GDP - are tipped to grow by a robust 1.2% in the June quarter.
This page will be updated as soon at the report is released at 11.30am AEST.
